<JD_START>
Job Title: Marketing Specialist

Location: Phoenix, AZ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Marketing, Sales

Description:
Marketing SpecialistEntry LevelHey you!Are you looking for a chance to prove your skills and cultivate a career?Look no further, we are ready to play!About Us:Breeze is a full-service sales and marketing agency that is working alongside major telecommunications clients to take on their sales and marketing campaigns and provide free to low-cost phones, tablets and data to low income families, in an effort to help them have new resources to technology and their better futures.Job Description:We are looking for a creative and driven Marketing Specialist Entry Level to develop and implement effective marketing strategies that will help us achieve our business objectives. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of marketing principles, excellent communication skills, and a passion for driving brand awareness and engagement.Key Responsibilities:Develop and execute marketing/sales campaigns to promote our products/services.Collaborate with the team to brainstorm new ideas and strategies for engaging our target audience.Analyze market trends and consumer behavior to identify opportunities for growth and optimization.Monitor and report on the performance of marketing/sales campaigns, using data and analytics to make informed decisions.Create compelling relevant content.Coordinate with internal teams and external partners to ensure consistency in messaging and branding across all channels.Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in marketing to continuously improve our strategies and tactics.What's in It for You:Gain hands-on experience and enhance your skills in sales and marketing/sales through tailored training sessions.Enjoy opportunities for career advancement within our rapidly expanding company.Travel to exciting destinations like Miami, Orlando, New York, Los Angeles, and beyond.Work alongside a supportive team that appreciates your input and efforts.Receive competitive compensation, including performance-based bonuses.Access comprehensive health, vision, and dental benefits.Traits:Enthusiastic and optimistic outlook.Eagerness to learn and adjust.Excellent communication abilities.Demonstrated leadership capabilities.Driven to succeed in sales and marketing.Who Can Apply:Interested candidates from all cultural and professional backgrounds are encouraged to apply ASAP!Seize the opportunity and apply now!Marketing SpecialistEntry Level

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
<JD_END>
